subject: RE: [junit] How to test private methods in a class.
msgSnippet: ... Sounds almost tautological to me. Just seems to me that it can be done without misusing the public access modifier... ;) Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
> If the API were smaller, easier to search, and easier to comprehend,
> then there'd be fewer questions about it.

Sounds almost tautological to me. Just seems to me that it can be done
without "misusing" the public access modifier... ;)

Cheers, Ilja
